awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Homological and Computational        Questions in Representation Theory
awd_abstract_narration: This research is concerned with the representation theory                  of artin algebras. The principal investigator will study                        homological and computational questions related to the                          representation theory of finite dimensional algebras. He will                   continue to investigate the finitistic dimension conjecture                     both theoretically and with the aid of computer-generated                       examples.                                                                            This project is concerned with the general area of ring                    theory. A ring is an algebraic structure having both an                         addition and a multiplication. These objects arise naturally                    and are important in many areas of mathematics and physics.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

inst.inst_name: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
